Stixbox Function

NOM

    pbinom - The binomial cumulative probability function

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

P = pbinom(k,n,p)

PARAMETRES

    • k : vector or matrix of nonnegative integers such that k<=n
    • n : nonnegative integer
    • p : probability
    • P : prob(X<=k) where X is a binomial variable B(n,p)

DESCRIPTION

    The binomial cumulative probability function
